statements.select:
SELECT AA.ID as ID , AA.Code as Code , AA.Name as Name , AA.Name as ListName , AA.Name as DispName , AA.Value as Value , AA.SortOrder as SortOrder , AA.MaxLength as MaxLength , AA.CodeValue01 as Option1 , AA.CodeValue02 as Option2 , AA.CodeValue03 as Option3 , AA.CodeValue04 as Option4 , AA.CodeValue05 as Option5 , AA.CodeValue06 as Option6 , AA.CodeValue07 as Option7 , AA.CodeValue08 as Option8 , AA.CodeValue09 as Option9 FROM IKBase.dbo.TCode AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.ParentCode = #ParentCode#
AND AA.UseYn = #UseYn#
AND AA.UseYn = 'Y'
AND ( AA.Code = #FindText# OR AA.Name Like '%'+#FindText#+'%' )
ORDER BY SortOrder, Name

SELECT AA.ID as ID , AA.Code as Code , AA.Name as Name , AA.Name as ListName , AA.Name as DispName , AA.Value as Value , AA.SortOrder as SortOrder , AA.MaxLength as MaxLength , AA.CodeValue01 as Option1 , AA.CodeValue02 as Option2 , AA.CodeValue03 as Option3 , AA.CodeValue04 as Option4 , AA.CodeValue05 as Option5 , AA.CodeValue06 as Option6 , AA.CodeValue07 as Option7 , AA.CodeValue08 as Option8 , AA.CodeValue09 as Option9 FROM IKBase.dbo.TCode AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.ParentCode IS NULL
AND AA.UseYn = #UseYn#
AND AA.UseYn = 'Y'
AND ( AA.Code = #FindText# OR AA.Name Like '%'+#FindText#+'%' )
ORDER BY Name, ID

SELECT aa.ID as ID , CONVERT(VARCHAR, aa.ID) as Code , aa.MenuName as Name , aa.MenuName as ListName , aa.MenuName as DispName , CONVERT(VARCHAR, aa.ID) as Value , ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY aa.SortOrder) as SortOrder , 0 as MaxLength , aa.ID as Option1 , null as Option2 , null as Option3 , null as Option4 , null as Option5 , null as Option6 , null as Option7 , null as Option8 , null as Option9 FROM IKBase.dbo.TMenu aa WHERE 1=1 AND aa.ParentID IS NULL
AND aa.MenuName Like '%'+#FindText#+'%'
ORDER BY SortOrder, Name

WITH CTE (ID, Name, Path, ParentID, HierID, Level) AS ( SELECT AA.ID as ID , AA.MenuName as Name , CONVERT(VARCHAR(1000), AA.MenuName) as Path , AA.ParentID as ParentID , CONVERT(VARCHAR(1000), RIGHT('000000' + CONVERT(VARCHAR, AA.SortOrder, AA.ID), 6)) as HierID , 1 as Level FROM IKBase.dbo.TMenu aa WHERE AA.ParentID IS NULL AND AA.UseYn = 'Y' UNION ALL SELECT AA.ID as ID , AA.MenuName as Name , CONVERT(VARCHAR(1000), bb.Path + ' ▶ ' + AA.MenuName) as Path , AA.ParentID as ParentID , CONVERT(VARCHAR(1000), bb.HierID + '-' + RIGHT('000000'+CONVERT(VARCHAR, AA.SortOrder, AA.ID), 6)) as HierID , bb.Level + 1 as Level FROM IKBase.dbo.TMenu aa INNER JOIN CTE bb on AA.ParentID = bb.ID WHERE AA.UseYn = 'Y' ) SELECT aa.ID as ID , CONVERT(VARCHAR, aa.ID) as Code , aa.Name as Name , REPLICATE(' ', (aa.Level -1) * 5) + CASE WHEN aa.Level > 1 then '▶' ELSE '' END + aa.Name as ListName , aa.Path as DispName , CONVERT(VARCHAR, aa.ID) as Value , ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY aa.HierID) as SortOrder , 0 as MaxLength , aa.ID as Option1 , aa.HierID as Option2 , null as Option3 , null as Option4 , null as Option5 , null as Option6 , null as Option7 , null as Option8 , null as Option9 FROM CTE aa WHERE 1=1
AND ( CONVERT(VARCHAR, aa.ID) = #FindText# OR aa.Name Like '%'+#FindText#+'%' )
ORDER BY SortOrder, Name

WITH CTE (ID, Name, Path, ParentID, HierID, Level) AS ( SELECT AA.ID as ID , AA.ViewName as Name , CONVERT(VARCHAR(1000), AA.ViewName) as Path , AA.ParentID as ParentID , CONVERT(VARCHAR(1000), RIGHT('000000' + CONVERT(VARCHAR, AA.ID), 6)) as HierID , 1 as Level FROM IKBase.dbo.TView aa WHERE AA.ParentID IS NULL AND AA.UseYn = 'Y' UNION ALL SELECT AA.ID as ID , AA.ViewName as Name , CONVERT(VARCHAR(1000), bb.Path + ' ▶ ' + AA.ViewName) as Path , AA.ParentID as ParentID , CONVERT(VARCHAR(1000), bb.HierID + '-' + RIGHT('000000'+CONVERT(VARCHAR, AA.ID), 6)) as HierID , bb.Level + 1 as Level FROM IKBase.dbo.TView aa INNER JOIN CTE bb on AA.ParentID = bb.ID WHERE AA.UseYn = 'Y' ) SELECT aa.ID as ID , CONVERT(VARCHAR, aa.ID) as Code , aa.Name as Name , REPLICATE(' ', (aa.Level -1) * 5) + CASE WHEN aa.Level > 1 THEN '▶' ELSE '' END + aa.Name as ListName , aa.Path as DispName , CONVERT(VARCHAR, aa.ID) as Value , ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY aa.HierID) as SortOrder , 0 as MaxLength , aa.ID as Option1 , aa.HierID as Option2 , null as Option3 , null as Option4 , null as Option5 , null as Option6 , null as Option7 , null as Option8 , null as Option9 FROM CTE aa WHERE 1=1
AND ( CONVERT(VARCHAR, aa.ID) = #FindText# OR aa.Name Like '%'+#FindText#+'%' )
ORDER BY SortOrder, Name

SELECT aa.ID as ID , CONVERT(VARCHAR, aa.ID) as Code , aa.ModuleName as Name , aa.ModuleName as ListName , aa.ModuleName as DispName , CONVERT(VARCHAR, aa.ID) as Value , ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY aa.ID) as SortOrder , 0 as MaxLength , null as Option1 , null as Option2 , null as Option3 , null as Option4 , null as Option5 , null as Option6 , null as Option7 , null as Option8 , null as Option9 FROM IKBase.dbo.TModule aa WHERE 1=1
AND AA.UseYn = #UseYn#
AND AA.UseYn = 'Y'
AND ( CONVERT(VARCHAR, aa.ID) = #FindText# OR aa.ModuleName Like '%'+#FindText#+'%' )
ORDER BY SortOrder, Name

WITH CTE (ID, Name, Path, ParentID, HierID, Level) AS ( SELECT AA.ID as ID , AA.RoleName as Name , CONVERT(VARCHAR(1000), AA.RoleName) as Path , AA.ParentID as ParentID , CONVERT(VARCHAR(1000), RIGHT('000000' + CONVERT(VARCHAR, AA.ID), 6)) as HierID , 1 as Level FROM IKBase.dbo.TRole aa WHERE AA.ParentID IS NULL AND AA.UseYn = 'Y' UNION ALL SELECT AA.ID as ID , AA.RoleName as Name , CONVERT(VARCHAR(1000), bb.Path + ' ▶ ' + AA.RoleName) as Path , AA.ParentID as ParentID , CONVERT(VARCHAR(1000), bb.HierID + '-' + RIGHT('000000'+CONVERT(VARCHAR, AA.ID), 6)) as HierID , bb.Level + 1 as Level FROM IKBase.dbo.TRole aa INNER JOIN CTE bb on AA.ParentID = bb.ID WHERE AA.UseYn = 'Y' ) SELECT aa.ID as ID , CONVERT(VARCHAR, aa.ID) as Code , aa.Name as Name , REPLICATE(' ', (aa.Level -1) * 5) + CASE WHEN aa.Level > 1 then '▶' ELSE '' END + aa.Name as ListName , aa.Path as DispName , CONVERT(VARCHAR, aa.ID) as Value , ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY aa.HierID) as SortOrder , 0 as MaxLength , aa.ID as Option1 , aa.HierID as Option2 , null as Option3 , null as Option4 , null as Option5 , null as Option6 , null as Option7 , null as Option8 , null as Option9 FROM CTE aa WHERE 1=1
AND ( CONVERT(VARCHAR, aa.ID) = #FindText# OR aa.Name Like '%'+#FindText#+'%' )
ORDER BY SortOrder, Name

WITH CTE (ID, Name, Path, ParentID, HierID, Level) AS ( SELECT AA.ID as ID , AA.GroupName as Name , CONVERT(VARCHAR(1000), AA.GroupName) as Path , AA.ParentID as ParentID , CONVERT(VARCHAR(1000), RIGHT('000000' + CONVERT(VARCHAR, AA.ID), 6)) as HierID , 1 as Level FROM IKBase.dbo.TGroup aa WHERE AA.ParentID IS NULL AND AA.UseYn = 'Y' UNION ALL SELECT AA.ID as ID , AA.GroupName as Name , CONVERT(VARCHAR(1000), bb.Path + ' ▶ ' + AA.GroupName) as Path , AA.ParentID as ParentID , CONVERT(VARCHAR(1000), bb.HierID + '-' + RIGHT('000000'+CONVERT(VARCHAR, AA.ID), 6)) as HierID , bb.Level + 1 as Level FROM IKBase.dbo.TGroup aa INNER JOIN CTE bb on AA.ParentID = bb.ID WHERE AA.UseYn = 'Y' ) SELECT aa.ID as ID , CONVERT(VARCHAR, aa.ID) as Code , aa.Name as Name , REPLICATE(' ', (aa.Level -1) * 5) + CASE WHEN aa.Level > 1 then '▶' ELSE '' END + aa.Name as ListName , aa.Path as DispName , CONVERT(VARCHAR, aa.ID) as Value , ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY aa.HierID) as SortOrder , 0 as MaxLength , aa.ID as Option1 , aa.HierID as Option2 , null as Option3 , null as Option4 , null as Option5 , null as Option6 , null as Option7 , null as Option8 , null as Option9 FROM CTE aa WHERE 1=1
AND ( CONVERT(VARCHAR, aa.ID) = #FindText# OR aa.Name Like '%'+#FindText#+'%' )
ORDER BY SortOrder, Name

SELECT aa.ID as ID , CONVERT(VARCHAR, aa.ID) as Code , aa.HelpName as Name , aa.HelpName as ListName , aa.HelpName as DispName , CONVERT(VARCHAR, aa.ID) as Value , ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY aa.ID) as SortOrder , 0 as MaxLength , aa.HelpType as Option1 , null as Option2 , null as Option3 , null as Option4 , null as Option5 , null as Option6 , null as Option7 , null as Option8 , null as Option9 FROM IKBase.dbo.THelp aa WHERE 1=1
AND ( CONVERT(VARCHAR, aa.ID) = #FindText# OR aa.HelpName Like '%'+#FindText#+'%' )
ORDER BY SortOrder, Name

SELECT aa.ID as ID , CONVERT(VARCHAR, aa.ID) as Code , aa.ServerName as Name , aa.ServerName as ListName , aa.ServerName as DispName , CONVERT(VARCHAR, aa.ID) as Value , ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY aa.ID) as SortOrder , 0 as MaxLength , null as Option1 , null as Option2 , null as Option3 , null as Option4 , null as Option5 , null as Option6 , null as Option7 , null as Option8 , null as Option9 FROM IKBase.dbo.TServer aa WHERE 1=1
AND ( CONVERT(VARCHAR, aa.ID) = #FindText# OR aa.ServerName Like '%'+#FindText#+'%' )
ORDER BY SortOrder, Name

SELECT aa.ID as ID , CONVERT(VARCHAR, aa.ID) as Code , aa.DatabaseName as Name , aa.DatabaseName as ListName , aa.DatabaseName as DispName , CONVERT(VARCHAR, aa.ID) as Value , ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY aa.ID) as SortOrder , 0 as MaxLength , aa.ServerID as Option1 , aa.DbmsType as Option2 , null as Option3 , null as Option4 , null as Option5 , null as Option6 , null as Option7 , null as Option8 , null as Option9 FROM IKBase.dbo.TDatabase aa WHERE 1=1
AND aa.ServerID = #ServerID#
AND ( CONVERT(VARCHAR, aa.ID) = #FindText# OR aa.DatabaseName Like '%'+#FindText#+'%' )
ORDER BY SortOrder, Name

SELECT aa.ID as ID , CONVERT(VARCHAR, aa.ID) as Code , aa.TableName as Name , aa.TableName as ListName , aa.TableName as DispName , CONVERT(VARCHAR, aa.ID) as Value , ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY aa.ID) as SortOrder , 0 as MaxLength , bb.ServerID as Option1 , aa.DatabaseID as Option2 , aa.SchemaID as Option3 , null as Option4 , null as Option5 , null as Option6 , null as Option7 , null as Option8 , null as Option9 FROM IKBase.dbo.TTable aa WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN IKBase.dbo.TDatabase bb WITH (NOLOCK) ON aa.DatabaseID = bb.ID WHERE 1=1
AND bb.ServerID = #ServerID#
AND aa.DatabaseID = #DatabaseID#
AND ( CONVERT(VARCHAR, aa.ID) = #FindText# OR aa.TableName Like '%'+#FindText#+'%' )
ORDER BY SortOrder, Name

SELECT aa.ID as ID , CONVERT(VARCHAR, aa.ID) as Code , aa.Name as Name , aa.Name as ListName , aa.Name as DispName , CONVERT(VARCHAR, aa.ID) as Value , ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY aa.ID) as SortOrder , 0 as MaxLength , null as Option1 , null as Option2 , null as Option3 , null as Option4 , null as Option5 , null as Option6 , null as Option7 , null as Option8 , null as Option9 FROM IKBiz.dbo.TChannel aa WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE 1=1
AND aa.UseYn = #UseYn#
AND aa.UseYn = 'Y'
AND ( CONVERT(VARCHAR, aa.ID) = #FindText# OR aa.Name Like '%'+#FindText#+'%' )
ORDER BY SortOrder, Name

SELECT aa.ID as ID , CONVERT(VARCHAR, aa.ID) as Code , aa.Name as Name , aa.Name as ListName , aa.Name as DispName , CONVERT(VARCHAR, aa.ID) as Value , ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY aa.ID) as SortOrder , 0 as MaxLength , null as Option1 , null as Option2 , null as Option3 , null as Option4 , null as Option5 , null as Option6 , null as Option7 , null as Option8 , null as Option9 FROM IKBiz.dbo.TBrand aa WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE 1=1
AND aa.UseYn = #UseYn#
AND aa.UseYn = 'Y'
AND ( CONVERT(VARCHAR, aa.ID) = #FindText# OR aa.Name Like '%'+#FindText#+'%' )
ORDER BY SortOrder, Name

SELECT aa.ID as ID , CONVERT(VARCHAR, aa.ID) as Code , aa.Name as Name , aa.Name as ListName , aa.Name as DispName , CONVERT(VARCHAR, aa.ID) as Value , ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY aa.ID) as SortOrder , 0 as MaxLength , null as Option1 , null as Option2 , null as Option3 , null as Option4 , null as Option5 , null as Option6 , null as Option7 , null as Option8 , null as Option9 FROM IKBiz.dbo.TStore aa WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE 1=1
AND aa.UseYn = #UseYn#
AND aa.UseYn = 'Y'
AND ( CONVERT(VARCHAR, aa.ID) = #FindText# OR aa.Name Like '%'+#FindText#+'%' )
ORDER BY SortOrder, Name

SELECT aa.ID as ID , CONVERT(VARCHAR, aa.ID) as Code , aa.Name as Name , aa.Name as ListName , aa.Name as DispName , CONVERT(VARCHAR, aa.ID) as Value , ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY aa.ID) as SortOrder , 0 as MaxLength , null as Option1 , null as Option2 , null as Option3 , null as Option4 , null as Option5 , null as Option6 , null as Option7 , null as Option8 , null as Option9 FROM IKBiz.dbo.TCompany aa WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE 1=1
AND aa.UseYn = #UseYn#
AND aa.UseYn = 'Y'
AND ( CONVERT(VARCHAR, aa.ID) = #FindText# OR aa.Name Like '%'+#FindText#+'%' )
ORDER BY SortOrder, Name

SELECT aa.ID as ID , CONVERT(VARCHAR, aa.ID) as Code , aa.Name as Name , aa.Name as ListName , aa.Name as DispName , CONVERT(VARCHAR, aa.ID) as Value , ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY aa.ID) as SortOrder , 0 as MaxLength , null as Option1 , null as Option2 , null as Option3 , null as Option4 , null as Option5 , null as Option6 , null as Option7 , null as Option8 , null as Option9 FROM IKBiz.dbo.TCustomer aa WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE 1=1
AND aa.UseYn = #UseYn#
AND aa.UseYn = 'Y'
AND ( CONVERT(VARCHAR, aa.ID) = #FindText# OR aa.Name Like '%'+#FindText#+'%' )
ORDER BY SortOrder, Name

SELECT aa.ID as ID , CONVERT(VARCHAR, aa.ID) as Code , aa.Name as Name , aa.Name as ListName , aa.Name as DispName , CONVERT(VARCHAR, aa.ID) as Value , ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY aa.ID) as SortOrder , 0 as MaxLength , null as Option1 , null as Option2 , null as Option3 , null as Option4 , null as Option5 , null as Option6 , null as Option7 , null as Option8 , null as Option9 FROM IKBiz.dbo.TPartner aa WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE 1=1
AND aa.UseYn = #UseYn#
AND aa.UseYn = 'Y'
AND ( CONVERT(VARCHAR, aa.ID) = #FindText# OR aa.Name Like '%'+#FindText#+'%' )
ORDER BY SortOrder, Name

SELECT aa.ID as ID , CONVERT(VARCHAR, aa.ID) as Code , aa.Name as Name , aa.Name as ListName , aa.Name as DispName , CONVERT(VARCHAR, aa.ID) as Value , ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY aa.ID) as SortOrder , 0 as MaxLength , null as Option1 , null as Option2 , null as Option3 , null as Option4 , null as Option5 , null as Option6 , null as Option7 , null as Option8 , null as Option9 FROM IKBiz.dbo.TMember aa WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE 1=1
AND ( CONVERT(VARCHAR, aa.ID) = #FindText# OR aa.Name Like '%'+#FindText#+'%' )
ORDER BY SortOrder, Name

WITH CAT (ID, Code, Name, Level, ParentCode, SortOrder) AS ( SELECT DISTINCT AA.Category1 as ID , RIGHT('00000000' + CONVERT(VARCHAR, AA.ID), 8) + RIGHT('00000000' + CONVERT(VARCHAR, AA.Category1), 8) as Code , BB.Name , 1 as Level , NULL as ParentCode , AA.SortOrder as SortOrder FROM IKBiz.dbo.TCategory AA INNER JOIN IKBiz.dbo.TCategoryItem BB ON AA.Category1 = BB.ID WHERE AA.Category1 IS NOT NULL AND AA.UseYn = 'Y' UNION ALL SELECT DISTINCT Category2 as ID , RIGHT('00000000' + CONVERT(VARCHAR, AA.ID), 8) + RIGHT('00000000' + CONVERT(VARCHAR, AA.Category2), 8) as Code , BB.Name , 2 as Level , RIGHT('00000000' + CONVERT(VARCHAR, AA.ID), 8) + RIGHT('00000000' + CONVERT(VARCHAR, AA.Category1), 8) as ParentCode , AA.SortOrder as SortOrder FROM IKBiz.dbo.TCategory AA INNER JOIN IKBiz.dbo.TCategoryItem BB ON AA.Category2 = BB.ID WHERE AA.Category2 IS NOT NULL AND AA.UseYn = 'Y' UNION ALL SELECT DISTINCT Category3 as ID , RIGHT('00000000' + CONVERT(VARCHAR, AA.ID), 8) + RIGHT('00000000' + CONVERT(VARCHAR, AA.Category3), 8) as Code , BB.Name , 3 as Level , RIGHT('00000000' + CONVERT(VARCHAR, AA.ID), 8) + RIGHT('00000000' + CONVERT(VARCHAR, AA.Category2), 8) as ParentCode , AA.SortOrder as SortOrder FROM IKBiz.dbo.TCategory AA INNER JOIN IKBiz.dbo.TCategoryItem BB ON AA.Category3 = BB.ID WHERE AA.Category3 IS NOT NULL AND AA.UseYn = 'Y' UNION ALL SELECT DISTINCT Category4 as ID , RIGHT('00000000' + CONVERT(VARCHAR, AA.ID), 8) + RIGHT('00000000' + CONVERT(VARCHAR, AA.Category4), 8) as Code , BB.Name , 4 as Level , RIGHT('00000000' + CONVERT(VARCHAR, AA.ID), 8) + RIGHT('00000000' + CONVERT(VARCHAR, AA.Category3), 8) as ParentCode , AA.SortOrder as SortOrder FROM IKBiz.dbo.TCategory AA INNER JOIN IKBiz.dbo.TCategoryItem BB ON AA.Category4 = BB.ID WHERE AA.Category4 IS NOT NULL AND AA.UseYn = 'Y' UNION ALL SELECT DISTINCT Category5 as ID , RIGHT('00000000' + CONVERT(VARCHAR, AA.ID), 8) + RIGHT('00000000' + CONVERT(VARCHAR, AA.Category5), 8) as Code , BB.Name , 5 as Level , RIGHT('00000000' + CONVERT(VARCHAR, AA.ID), 8) + RIGHT('00000000' + CONVERT(VARCHAR, AA.Category4), 8) as ParentCode , AA.SortOrder as SortOrder FROM IKBiz.dbo.TCategory AA INNER JOIN IKBiz.dbo.TCategoryItem BB ON AA.Category5 = BB.ID WHERE AA.Category5 IS NOT NULL AND AA.UseYn = 'Y' ) , CTE (ID, Code, Name, Path, ParentCode, HierID, Level) AS ( SELECT AA.ID as ID , AA.Code , AA.Name as Name , CONVERT(VARCHAR(MAX), AA.Name) as Path , AA.ParentCode as ParentCode , CONVERT(VARCHAR(MAX), RIGHT('000000' + CONVERT(VARCHAR, AA.SortOrder), 6) + AA.Code) as HierID , 1 as Level FROM CAT aa WHERE aa.ParentCode IS NULL UNION ALL SELECT AA.ID as ID , AA.Code as Code , AA.Name as Name , CONVERT(VARCHAR(MAX), bb.Path + ' ▶ ' + AA.Name) as Path , AA.ParentCode as ParentCode , CONVERT(VARCHAR(MAX), bb.HierID + '-' + RIGHT('000000'+CONVERT(VARCHAR, AA.SortOrder), 6) + AA.Code) as HierID , bb.Level + 1 as Level FROM CAT aa INNER JOIN CTE bb on AA.ParentCode = bb.Code ) SELECT aa.ID as ID , CONVERT(VARCHAR, aa.ID) as Code , aa.Name as Name , REPLICATE(' ', (aa.Level -1) * 5) + CASE WHEN aa.Level > 1 then '▶' ELSE '' END + aa.Name as ListName , aa.Path as DispName , CONVERT(VARCHAR, aa.ID) as Value , ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY aa.HierID) as SortOrder , 0 as MaxLength , CONVERT(VARCHAR, aa.ID) as Option1 , aa.HierID as Option2 , aa.ParentCode as Option3 , null as Option4 , null as Option5 , null as Option6 , null as Option7 , null as Option8 , null as Option9 FROM CTE aa WHERE 1=1
AND ( aa.Code = #FindText# OR aa.Name Like '%'+#FindText#+'%' )
ORDER BY SortOrder, Name

SELECT aa.ID as ID , CONVERT(VARCHAR, aa.ID) as Code , aa.Name as Name , aa.Name as ListName , aa.Name as DispName , CONVERT(VARCHAR, aa.ID) as Value , ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY aa.SortOrder, aa.ID) as SortOrder , 0 as MaxLength , aa.CategoryType as Option1 , null as Option2 , null as Option3 , null as Option4 , null as Option5 , null as Option6 , null as Option7 , null as Option8 , null as Option9 FROM IKBiz.dbo.TCategoryItem aa WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE 1=1 AND aa.CategoryType = #CategoryType#
AND aa.UseYn = #UseYn#
AND aa.UseYn = 'Y'
AND ( CONVERT(VARCHAR, aa.ID) = #FindText# OR aa.Name Like '%'+#FindText#+'%' )
ORDER BY SortOrder, Name

SELECT aa.ID as ID , CONVERT(VARCHAR, aa.ID) as Code , aa.Name as Name , aa.Name as ListName , aa.Name as DispName , CONVERT(VARCHAR, aa.ID) as Value , ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY aa.ID) as SortOrder , 0 as MaxLength , null as Option1 , null as Option2 , null as Option3 , null as Option4 , null as Option5 , null as Option6 , null as Option7 , null as Option8 , null as Option9 FROM IKBiz.dbo.TInfoNotice aa WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE 1=1
AND aa.UseYn = #UseYn#
AND aa.UseYn = 'Y'
AND ( CONVERT(VARCHAR, aa.ID) = #FindText# OR aa.Name Like '%'+#FindText#+'%' )
ORDER BY SortOrder, Name

WITH CTE (ID, Name, Path, ParentID, HierID, Level) AS ( SELECT AA.ID as ID , AA.Name as Name , CONVERT(VARCHAR(1000), AA.Name) as Path , AA.ParentID as ParentID , CONVERT(VARCHAR(1000), RIGHT('000000' + CONVERT(VARCHAR, AA.Name, AA.ID), 6)) as HierID , 1 as Level FROM IKBiz.dbo.TDepartment aa WHERE AA.ParentID IS NULL AND AA.UseYn = 'Y' UNION ALL SELECT AA.ID as ID , AA.Name as Name , CONVERT(VARCHAR(1000), bb.Path + ' ▶ ' + AA.Name) as Path , AA.ParentID as ParentID , CONVERT(VARCHAR(1000), bb.HierID + '-' + RIGHT('000000'+CONVERT(VARCHAR, AA.Name, AA.ID), 6)) as HierID , bb.Level + 1 as Level FROM IKBiz.dbo.TDepartment aa INNER JOIN CTE bb on AA.ParentID = bb.ID WHERE AA.UseYn = 'Y' ) SELECT aa.ID as ID , CONVERT(VARCHAR, aa.ID) as Code , aa.Name as Name , REPLICATE(' ', (aa.Level -1) * 5) + CASE WHEN aa.Level > 1 then '▶' ELSE '' END + aa.Name as ListName , aa.Path as DispName , CONVERT(VARCHAR, aa.ID) as Value , ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY aa.HierID) as SortOrder , 0 as MaxLength , aa.ID as Option1 , aa.HierID as Option2 , null as Option3 , null as Option4 , null as Option5 , null as Option6 , null as Option7 , null as Option8 , null as Option9 FROM CTE aa WHERE 1=1
AND ( CONVERT(VARCHAR, aa.ID) = #FindText# OR aa.Name Like '%'+#FindText#+'%' )
ORDER BY SortOrder, Name

SELECT aa.ID as ID , CONVERT(VARCHAR, aa.ID) as Code , aa.Name as Name , aa.Name as ListName , aa.Name as DispName , CONVERT(VARCHAR, aa.ID) as Value , ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY aa.Name, aa.ID) as SortOrder , 0 as MaxLength , null as Option1 , null as Option2 , null as Option3 , null as Option4 , null as Option5 , null as Option6 , null as Option7 , null as Option8 , null as Option9 FROM IKBiz.dbo.TEmployee aa WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE 1=1
AND aa.UseYn = #UseYn#
AND aa.UseYn = 'Y'
AND ( CONVERT(VARCHAR, aa.ID) = #FindText# OR aa.Name Like '%'+#FindText#+'%' )
ORDER BY SortOrder

SELECT aa.ID as ID , CONVERT(VARCHAR, aa.ID) as Code , aa.Name as Name , aa.Name as ListName , aa.Name as DispName , CONVERT(VARCHAR, aa.ID) as Value , ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY aa.SortOrder, aa.ID) as SortOrder , 0 as MaxLength , aa.Url as Option1 , CONVERT(VARCHAR, aa.ParentID) as Option2 , null as Option3 , null as Option4 , null as Option5 , null as Option6 , null as Option7 , null as Option8 , null as Option9 FROM IKScrap.dbo.TScrapSite aa WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE aa.ParentID IS NULL AND aa.UseYn = 'Y'
AND ( aa.Name Like '%'+#FindText#+'%' )
ORDER BY SortOrder, Name

SELECT aa.ID as ID , aa.Code as Code , aa.Name as Name , aa.Name as ListName , aa.Name as DispName , aa.Code as Value , ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY aa.Name) as SortOrder , 0 as MaxLength , aa.Url as Option1 , CONVERT(VARCHAR, aa.SiteID) as Option2 , null as Option3 , null as Option4 , null as Option5 , null as Option6 , null as Option7 , null as Option8 , null as Option9 FROM IKScrap.dbo.TScrapBrand aa WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE aa.SiteID = #SiteID#
AND ( aa.Name Like '%'+#FindText#+'%' )
ORDER BY SortOrder, Name

SELECT aa.ID as ID , CONVERT(VARCHAR, aa.ID) as Code , aa.Name as Name , aa.Name as ListName , aa.Name as DispName , CONVERT(VARCHAR, aa.ID) as Value , ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY aa.Name) as SortOrder , 0 as MaxLength , null as Option1 , CONVERT(VARCHAR, aa.SiteID) as Option2 , null as Option3 , null as Option4 , null as Option5 , null as Option6 , null as Option7 , null as Option8 , null as Option9 FROM IKScrap.dbo.TScrapCategory aa WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE aa.SiteID = #SiteID#
AND ( aa.Name Like '%'+#FindText#+'%' )
ORDER BY SortOrder, Name

SELECT aa.ID as ID , CONVERT(VARCHAR, aa.ID) as Code , aa.name as Name , aa.name as ListName , aa.name as DispName , CONVERT(VARCHAR, aa.uid) as Value , ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY aa.name, aa.uid) as SortOrder , 0 as MaxLength , null as Option1 , null as Option2 , null as Option3 , null as Option4 , null as Option5 , null as Option6 , null as Option7 , null as Option8 , null as Option9 FROM IKScrap.dbo.TSmapsAgency aa WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE 1=1
AND ( aa.name Like '%'+#FindText#+'%' )
ORDER BY SortOrder, Name

SELECT aa.ID as ID , CONVERT(VARCHAR, aa.ID) as Code , aa.name as Name , aa.name as ListName , aa.name as DispName , CONVERT(VARCHAR, aa.uid) as Value , ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY aa.name, aa.uid) as SortOrder , 0 as MaxLength , convert(varchar, aa.agency_uid) as Option1 , null as Option2 , null as Option3 , null as Option4 , null as Option5 , null as Option6 , null as Option7 , null as Option8 , null as Option9 FROM IKScrap.dbo.TSmapsBrand aa WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE 1=1
AND ( aa.agency_uid = #AgencyUid# )
AND ( aa.name Like '%'+#FindText#+'%' )
ORDER BY SortOrder, Name

SELECT aa.ID as ID , CONVERT(VARCHAR, aa.ID) as Code , aa.title as Name , aa.title as ListName , aa.title as DispName , CONVERT(VARCHAR, aa.uid) as Value , ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY aa.title, aa.uid) as SortOrder , 0 as MaxLength , convert(varchar, aa.agency_uid) as Option1 , convert(varchar, aa.brand_uid) as Option2 , null as Option3 , null as Option4 , null as Option5 , null as Option6 , null as Option7 , null as Option8 , null as Option9 FROM IKScrap.dbo.TSmapsLookbook aa WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE 1=1
AND ( aa.agency_uid = #AgencyUid# )
AND ( aa.brand_uid = #BrandUid# )
AND ( aa.name Like '%'+#FindText#+'%' )
ORDER BY SortOrder, Name

SELECT aa.ID as ID , CONVERT(VARCHAR, aa.ID) as Code , aa.name as Name , aa.name as ListName , aa.name as DispName , CONVERT(VARCHAR, aa.uid) as Value , ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY aa.name, aa.uid) as SortOrder , 0 as MaxLength , null as Option1 , null as Option2 , null as Option3 , null as Option4 , null as Option5 , null as Option6 , null as Option7 , null as Option8 , null as Option9 FROM IKScrap.dbo.TSmapsCategory aa WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE 1=1
AND ( aa.name Like '%'+#FindText#+'%' )
ORDER BY SortOrder, Name

SELECT aa.ID as ID , CONVERT(VARCHAR, aa.ID) as Code , aa.text as Name , aa.text as ListName , aa.text as DispName , aa.value as Value , ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY aa.text, aa.value) as SortOrder , 0 as MaxLength , null as Option1 , null as Option2 , null as Option3 , null as Option4 , null as Option5 , null as Option6 , null as Option7 , null as Option8 , null as Option9 FROM IKScrap.dbo.TSmapsColor aa WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE 1=1
AND ( aa.text Like '%'+#FindText#+'%' )
ORDER BY SortOrder, Name

SELECT aa.ID as ID , CONVERT(VARCHAR, aa.ID) as Code , aa.text as Name , aa.text as ListName , aa.text as DispName , CONVERT(VARCHAR, aa.uid) as Value , ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY aa.text, aa.uid) as SortOrder , 0 as MaxLength , convert(varchar, aa.category_uid) as Option1 , aa.sex as Option2 , null as Option3 , null as Option4 , null as Option5 , null as Option6 , null as Option7 , null as Option8 , null as Option9 FROM IKScrap.dbo.TSmapsSize aa WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE 1=1
AND aa.category_uid = #CategoryUid#
AND aa.sex = #Sex#
AND aa.text Like '%'+#FindText#+'%'
ORDER BY SortOrder, Name

SELECT aa.ID as ID , CONVERT(VARCHAR, aa.ID) as Code , aa.name as Name , aa.name as ListName , aa.name as DispName , CONVERT(VARCHAR, aa.uid) as Value , ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY aa.name, aa.uid) as SortOrder , 0 as MaxLength , convert(varchar, aa.agency_uid) as Option1 , sex as Option2 , null as Option3 , null as Option4 , null as Option5 , null as Option6 , null as Option7 , null as Option8 , null as Option9 FROM IKScrap.dbo.TSmapsUser aa WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE 1=1
AND ( aa.agency_uid = #AgencyUid# )
AND ( aa.name Like '%'+#FindText#+'%' )
ORDER BY SortOrder, Name

SELECT AA.Code as Code , AA.Name as Name , AA.Name as ListName , AA.Name as DispName , AA.Value as Value , AA.ParentCode as GroupCode , ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY AA.ParentCode ORDER BY AA.SortOrder, AA.Name) as SortOrder , AA.MaxLength as MaxLength , AA.CodeValue01 as Option1 , AA.CodeValue02 as Option2 , AA.CodeValue03 as Option3 , AA.CodeValue04 as Option4 , AA.CodeValue05 as Option5 , AA.CodeValue06 as Option6 , AA.CodeValue07 as Option7 , AA.CodeValue08 as Option8 , AA.CodeValue09 as Option9 FROM IKBase.dbo.TCode AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.ParentCode IS NOT NULL AND AA.UseYn = 'Y' UNION ALL SELECT AA.Code as Code , AA.Name as Name , AA.Name as ListName , AA.Name as DispName , AA.Value as Value , 'CodeGroup' as GroupCode , ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.Name, AA.SortOrder, AA.ID) as SortOrder , AA.MaxLength as MaxLength , AA.CodeValue01 as Option1 , AA.CodeValue02 as Option2 , AA.CodeValue03 as Option3 , AA.CodeValue04 as Option4 , AA.CodeValue05 as Option5 , AA.CodeValue06 as Option6 , AA.CodeValue07 as Option7 , AA.CodeValue08 as Option8 , AA.CodeValue09 as Option9 FROM IKBase.dbo.TCode AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.ParentCode IS NULL AND AA.UseYn = 'Y' ORDER BY GroupCode, SortOrder
